instructions: In a saucepan, cook beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
Stir in the remaining ingredients; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until heated through.
title: Chili For Two
steps: In a saucepan, cook beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Stir in the remaining ingredients; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until heated through.
